content:
In the Donetsk direction, the soldiers of a separate airborne assault team destroyed 3 tanks and 4 armored vehicles of the enemy, 6 more tanks were damaged. Two Russian tanks and three BMPs were destroyed on the outskirts of Marinka during another Russian storm.

More about the situation in the Donetsk direction will be told by the presenter of the first separate tank of the Siverskya Brigade of Dina Wong.

In the Avdeevsky direction, the 47th brigade showed how and how her fighters destroy the invaders.

In the Kherson direction, SCO snipers act quietly and unnoticed. They managed to destroy six Russian fighters at once.

Three Russians were lost near Avdiivka, there was nothing left to the warriors of the 47th brigade but how to eliminate three occupiers with one drone.

Rubpak of the 56th OMPB decided to save its FPV-punks, which is why they frightened them by the Russian that he had blown himself with a grenade.

These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - junior lieutenant Sergei Lipko and Lieutenant Colonel Sergei Misyura.
title: SCO destroyed six Russians, the 47th brigade reflects the enemy's assaults: Star from the frontline city
description: More about the situation in the Donetsk direction will tell the presenter of the first separate tank ...
author: Army Inform
